channel.title: [317] Interfaces
channel.description:
Hello,
If want to make a interface if you typ the command "help". It should show some help in an interface. I currently have a 317 server but on a 562 server I could just use: player.getActionSender().sendInterface(174, false); player.getActionSender().sendString("Help", 174, 1);
Its not working on my 317 server. Did I do something wrong? Or are there other methods to do this for a 317 server. And is it even possible at all?
Thanks! :)
_____________________
EDIT: Does anyone know how? please :o

item.title: [317] Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @flexie2 flexie2
item.description:
@flexie2 wrote:

Hello,

If want to make a interface if you typ the command “help”.
It should show some help in an interface.
I currently have a 317 server but on a 562 server I could just use:
player.getActionSender().sendInterface(174, false);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help”, 174, 1);

Its not working on my 317 server. Did I do something wrong?
Or are there other methods to do this for a 317 server. And is it even possible at all?

Thanks!

EDIT: Does anyone know how? please :o

Read full topic
